data.name: Yelena Belova
data.description: Yelena Belova's training in Russia's "Red Room" allows her to strike with deadly precision, dealing bonus Crit damage to her enemies.

starItems.name: Yelena Belova
starItems.description: Yelena Belova's training in Russia's "Red Room" allows her to strike with deadly precision, dealing bonus Crit damage to her enemies.

1.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.
Gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> or Black Widow ally.

2.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.
Gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> or Black Widow ally.

3.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>140%</color> damage.
Gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> or Black Widow ally.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary target
If this character or any ally has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to transfer <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, to self

4.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>160%</color> damage.
Gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> or Black Widow ally.
If this character or any ally has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to transfer <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self.

5.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.
Gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> or Black Widow ally.
If this character or any ally has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to transfer <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self.

6.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>200%</color> damage.
Gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> or Black Widow ally.
If this character or any ally has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to transfer <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary target
If this character or any ally has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, always transfer <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects

7.description:
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage.
Gain an assist from a random <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> or Black Widow ally.
If this character or any ally has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, transfer <color=#86e619>2</color> positive effects, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, on primary target to self.

1.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>90%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary target
Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>

2.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.

3.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.

4.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.

5.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.

6.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>240%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color>.

Gain +<color=#86e619>1</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary target
Apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns
Gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>

7.description:
Transfer <color=#86e619>1</color> positive effect, excluding <color=#fff568>Taunt</color>, from primary target to self and all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies.
Attack primary target for <color=#86e619>280%</color> damage + apply <color=#fff568>Disrupted</color> for <color=#86e619>2</color> turns.

Gain +<color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, up to a maximum of <color=#86e619>3</color>.

This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>100%</color> damage.

This attack cannot be blocked.
1.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>20%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
This attack has <color=#86e619>10%</color> Extra Crit Chance

2.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>120%</color> damage.

This attack has <color=#86e619>10%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
This attack cannot be blocked.
2.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

3.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>150%</color> damage.

This attack has <color=#86e619>10%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
This attack cannot be blocked.
3.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>10%</color> Extra Crit Chance

4.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>180%</color> damage.

This attack has <color=#86e619>20%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
This attack cannot be blocked.
4.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
Clear all <color=#fff568>Deflect</color> on primary and secondary targets

5.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>210%</color> damage + clear all <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.

This attack has <color=#86e619>20%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
This attack cannot be blocked.
5.nextUpgrade: +<color=#86e619>40%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets

6.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>250%</color> damage + clear all <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.

This attack has <color=#86e619>20%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
This attack cannot be blocked.
6.nextUpgrade:
+<color=#86e619>50%</color> damage to primary and secondary targets
+<color=#86e619>30%</color> Extra Crit Chance

7.description:
Attack primary and adjacent targets for <color=#86e619>300%</color> damage + clear all <color=#fff568>Deflect</color>.

This attack has <color=#86e619>50%</color> Extra Crit Chance.
This attack cannot be blocked.

1.description:
On <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>. While this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain <color=#86e619>+50%</color> Crit Damage.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy.
1.nextUpgrade:
Lower Crit Chance for all enemies by <color=#86e619>10%</color>
Lower the chance to assist on non-attack abilities for all enemies by <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> ally, max <color=#86e619>40%</color>

2.description:
On <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, <color=#86e619>50%</color> chance to gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>. While this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain <color=#86e619>+50%</color> Crit Damage.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy.

Lower Crit Chance by <color=#86e619>10%</color> for all enemies.
Lower the chance to assist on non-attack abilities for all enemies by <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> ally, up to a max of <color=#86e619>40%</color>.

3.description:
On <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>. While this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain <color=#86e619>+50%</color> Crit Damage.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy.

Lower Crit Chance for all enemies by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
Lower the chance to assist on non-attack abilities for all enemies by <color=#86e619>10%</color> per <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> ally, up to a max of <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
3.nextUpgrade:
<color=#86e619>+50%</color> Crit Damage
Lower the chance to assist on non-attack abilities by an additional <color=#86e619>15%</color> per <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color>, max <color=#86e619>100%</color>

4.description:
On <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>. While this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain <color=#86e619>+100%</color> Crit Damage.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy.

Lower Crit Chance for all enemies by <color=#86e619>10%</color>.
Lower the chance to assist on non-attack abilities for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> ally, up to a max of <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
4.nextUpgrade:
Lower Crit Chance by  an additional <color=#86e619>15%</color>
On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, at the end of any turn, if a non-<color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> ally is <color=#fff568>Taunting</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to them

5.description:
On <color=#fff568>Offense Up</color>, gain <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>. While this character has <color=#fff568>Stealth</color>, gain <color=#86e619>+100%</color> Crit Damage.

If this character has <color=#fff568>Speed Up</color>, all <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> allies gain +<color=#86e619>100%</color> Accuracy.

On <color=#fff568>WAR OFFENSE</color>, at the end of any turn, if a non-<color=#fff568>PROTECTOR</color> <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> ally is <color=#fff568>Taunting</color>, clear <color=#fff568>Taunt</color> and apply <color=#fff568>Stealth</color> + <color=#86e619>2</color> <color=#fff568>Regeneration</color> to them.

Lower Crit Chance for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color>.
Lower the chance to assist on non-attack abilities for all enemies by <color=#86e619>25%</color> per <color=#fff568>SKILL</color> <color=#fff568>MILITARY</color> ally, up to a max of <color=#86e619>100%</color>.
